name: Robust Fungal Nucleus
description: Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elementalstimulation.  It is generally believed that the Fungi evolved into more mobile forms tobetter disperse their spores.  A poet once depicted a shared dream of the Fungi in which their spores coveredevery inch of the mountains and oceans. The world had never been moretranquil. Then the Fungi turned into fish, birds, beasts, men, and gods,relying on rainfall, land, and their own kind who had returned to the earth.
